thread.section_title: Parcel Monkey USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Parcel Monkey USA | parcelmonkey.com
thread.title: Michael Fruci, Calabria Solutions, USA
thread.title_full: Parcel Monkey USA reviewed by Michael Fruci, Calabria Solutions, USA

author: Michael Fruci, Calabria Solutions, USA
title: Michael Fruci, Calabria Solutions, USA
text: Received Quote: from FedEx, UPS, and two other shippers and they were all over $150 each to ship. Parcel Monkey was under $40 for same package and got from California to India in same amount of time. Great job. Definitely will use again.
